requestBody.title: Configure default pricing rules API Trace

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

requestBody.failureMessage: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Simulate customer joining waitlist/queue or prepaying for limited batch capacity.
data.expectedResult: System records customer demand in queue/waitlist model and exposes deterministic status transitions.
data.failureMessage: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-join-waitlist-flow: Waitlist/queue API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.
